  15. class RepoAPIView(LoginRequiredMixin, JSONResponseMixin, SingleObjectMixin, View):
  17. """View for managing BitBucket API"""
  19. model = Service
  21. def dispatch(self, request, repo, *args, **kwargs):

  25. def post(self, request, repo, *args, **kwargs):

  27. context = self.repo_api.repositories()
  28. elif self.request.POST['data'] == 'addhook':

  31. return self.render_json_response(context)
